overview.archetype: Turn Meter Control / Buff Feeder / Stun Specialist

gear_tradeoffs.pros: Extra turns for more control and buffs
Consistent turn cycling, reliable buff uptime

a1.name: Arcane Dynamo
a1.notes: Attacks 1 enemy. Fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 10% (20% if critical).

a2.name: Timeslip
a2.notes: Attacks 1 enemy, then all others if first hit is critical. Each hit has 75% chance (booked) to place [Stun] for 1 turn. After attacking, decreases Turn Meter of each enemy without [Stun] by 20%.

a3.name: Psychic Guidance
a3.notes: Places 30% [Increase SPD], 30% [Increase C.RATE], and 30% [Increase C.DMG] on all allies for 2 turns.

passive.impact: Immune to Turn Meter decreasing effects.

booking.notes: A2 and A3 gain significant cooldown reduction and effect chance.

rotation.average_damage: Moderate overall, excels in control and buffing

scenarios.notes: Procs on A2 AoE hits, boosting wave clear and boss damage.
Focus on ACC for control, not direct damage.

clan_boss.notes: Provides buffs and TM control, but not a top CB damage dealer.

synergy.relentless_viability: High for PvE, can disrupt strict speed tunes in CB/Arena.

investment.notes: Top-tier epic for control, buffing, and speed teams. Books are a great investment.

owned_comparison.comparison: Deacon offers TM boost and DEF Down, but less control.
Seer benefits from Hellmut’s buffs for nuking waves.

draft_logic.notes: Early pick for speed/buff teams, counter-pick vs TM control teams.

gear_set_stability.Reflex: Can reduce cooldowns for more frequent buffs/control.
gear_set_stability.Relentless: Extra turns can desync team but increase control potential.
gear_set_stability.Savage: Not recommended, as Hellmut is not a nuker.

utility_comparison.comparison: Deacon is more accessible but less versatile.
Seer relies on Hellmut’s buffs for max damage.
Arbiter offers revive and TM boost, but less control.

final_summary.mastery_preference: Warmaster for PvE, Eagle Eye for Arena/Control
final_summary.damage_rotation: A2 for control, A3 for buffs, A1 for TM cycling
final_summary.turn_meter_stability: Stable with Speed/Perception, variable with Relentless
final_summary.passive_impact: Immunity to TM reduction is strong in Arena and vs Valkyrie/Lyssandra
final_summary.gear_stat_notes: Prioritize SPD, ACC, C.RATE. Relentless for PvE, Speed for Arena/CB.
final_summary.ally_synergy_impact: Excellent with Seer, Arbiter, and other speed/buff teams.
final_summary.relentless_viability: High for PvE, avoid in strict speed tunes.

team_setups.name: Speed Nuke (Seer)
team_setups.strategy: Buff up with A3, Seer nukes waves, Lydia for DEF Down/Weaken.

team_setups.name: Arena Control
team_setups.strategy: Speed lead, TM boost, control with A2, revive with Scyl.

similar_champions.similarity_reason: Synergizes with buffs for wave clear.
